entities.c: Former village headman of Lisle; age 40; skilled rider with possible military background. Gift-shock from violently awakened Mage-Gift (immensely powerful, type uncertain, possibly Firestarting-adjacent)—mental channels burned open, causing white-hot agony and inability to control magical awareness. Vision blurry, barely functional. Possesses red robe hood/blade as evidence.

White Companion mare, sapphire eyes, silver mane. Adult status 3 years, unpartnered until now. STANCE-Rance: Chose him despite his age/bitterness; bond formed—provides unconditional love, mental stabilization of ragged channels, knowledge of what he is; frustrated by his stubbornness but committed; shares purpose to reach Haven and train his Gift. Recognized red robes indicate organized threat beyond ordinary bandits.

Small village on Valdemar's outskirts near Karse/Rethwellan/Menmellith borders. Completely obliterated—reduced to ash, charred timber fragments, scorched foundations, crater at epicenter. Destroyed by Rance's uncontrolled Gift release. Population dead or captured. Bandit/cultist footprints lead toward Menmellith.

Organized group disguised as bandits (red robes hidden under bandit garb). Attacked Lisle to capture villagers; triggered Rance's Gift awakening (unknown if intentional); suffered casualties from magical blast; fled toward Menmellith. Motive unknown. May return.
